title: Ilana Glazer & Abbi Jacobson | A Closer Look: Trump, Flynn and Obstruction of Justice; Senate Passes GOP Tax Plan
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how one of President Trump's closest associates pleaded guilty on Friday to lying to the FBI and how Republicans forged ahead with a radical plan to slash taxes for corporations and the wealthy.

Then, Ilana Glazer and Abbi Jacobson share their fondest memories of performing at the Upright Citizens Brigade Theatre in Chelsea and take a moment to talk about DACA.

After they, Ilana and Abbi continue the discussion backstage.

LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
